The Government has obtained the title deed from them and has confirmed that they have no dues from the Housing Society on the house site which is in the possession of the claimant for more than 10 years. 201148432167030
Received.
The applicant/settlement certificate as described above is hereby registered with the intention of granting permanent rights to the fruits of the houses enjoyed by the beneficiaries or heirs under the Government's Jagannana Purna Gruha Haak Scheme.
Subject to AP Assigned Lands (PoT) (AMENDMENT), section 3 (2A) and Section 3 (2B); and in accordance with GO MS no 314, Revenue (Lands-I) Department, dated: 11/11/2021, this document is hereby issued.
Therefore, from now on, you may freely transfer the said Scheduled Property to your sons and grandsons, as per your wish, with the powers of donation, exchange, sale and You may enjoy it. If you do so, neither you nor your heirs nor your representatives nor the Government of Andhra Pradesh nor their representatives shall have any claim or dispute in future. You shall pay all taxes payable on the said immovable property in your name. Mea
Written by AR
GOLUGONDA MANDAL

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: Gundupala/Gundupala W-B: 6-0 SURVEY: 131/1A HOUSE:6-5/75 EXTENT: 104SQ.Yds BUILT: 609SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: EEGALA RAMANA [S] CC ROAD [E]: CHANDAKA NOOKARAJU [W]: GAVIREDDI SRINU

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 144005 of 2022, dated 25/Jan/2022, executed by Government of Andhra Pradesh Rep.By Golugonda Tahsildar K. Venkateswara Rao, in favour of Gavireddi Laxmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 104 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 5-75, comprised in survey number 131-1A, situated in Gundupala Village and Panchayat, Golugonda Mandal, within the District of Visakhapatnam, registered at sub-registrar office Narsipatnam is bounded as follows: North by: Eegala Ramana South by: CC Road East by: Chandaka Nookaraju West by: Gavireddi Srinu
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note 1. It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO name is mentioned as Narsipatnam, whereas the document was actually registered before the SRO, Gundupala. Further, the year of registration has been incorrectly mentioned as 2001 instead of 2002 on the back side of the deed. Therefore, it is advisable for the F.I. to verify the same and proceed accordingly. 2. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
